hero.description: Transform any food label into actionable health insights. Upload, scan, and discover what's really in your food with our cutting-edge OCR and AI technology.
hero.feature_smart_ocr_description: Advanced text extraction from any food label
hero.feature_ai_insights_description: Powered by advanced AI for smart analysis
hero.feature_multi_language_description: Supports major Indian languages including Hindi, Tamil, Bengali, Marathi, and more.

features.section_description: Discover why NutriScan is the most advanced nutrition label interpreter available, powered by cutting-edge AI and OCR technology.

lightning_fast.title: Lightning Fast
lightning_fast.description: Extract text from labels in seconds

ai_powered_analysis.title: AI-Powered Analysis
ai_powered_analysis.description: Advanced AI provides intelligent nutritional insights and personalized health recommendations.

interactive_visualizations.title: Interactive Visualizations
interactive_visualizations.description: Beautiful charts and graphs help you understand nutritional information at a glance.

multi_language_support.title: Multi-Language Support
multi_language_support.description: Supports major Indian languages including Hindi, Tamil, Bengali, Marathi, and more.

mobile_first_design.title: Mobile-First Design
mobile_first_design.description: Fully responsive interface works perfectly on all devices from mobile to desktop.

privacy_security.title: Privacy & Security
privacy_security.description: Your food label images and personal data are processed securely and privately.

features.cta_heading: Ready to unlock your nutrition insights?
features.cta_description: Join thousands of users who are making healthier food choices with NutriScan.

brand.description: Revolutionizing how you understand nutrition labels with AI-powered insights and smart OCR technology. Make informed food choices effortlessly.

scanner.section_description: Upload an image of any nutrition label and let our AI extract and analyze the nutritional information for you.
scanner.extracted_info_placeholder: Upload and scan a label to see extracted text here
scanner.feature_highly_accurate_description: Advanced OCR technology for precise results

file_too_large.title: File too large
file_too_large.description: Please select an image smaller than 10MB

upload_success.title: Image uploaded successfully!
upload_success.description: Click 'Scan Label' to extract nutrition information

ocr_failed.description: Could not extract text from the image.
